What are the treatments for carnitine palmitoyltransferase II deficiency ?,"These resources address the diagnosis or management of CPT II deficiency:  - Baby's First Test  - FOD (Fatty Oxidation Disorders) Family Support Group: Diagnostic Approach to Disorders of Fat Oxidation - Information for Clinicians  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Carnitine Palmitoyltransferase I
